text: A big shoutout to Mr Steve Poh, Mdm Shasila & Mr Lee Wei Chai who helped me survive in PJC
Very caring teachers that go to the mile to educate. Learn to be a leader. Teachers are very experienced with long service years

Studied here for two years. Environment is overall cozy. While there might be hiccups here and there, PJC is never a disappointment. While the JC merged and changed its name, hope the culture remains like how it was.

Year after years disturbance to residents of blk 5,6,7HDB. It don't deserve to be name Jurong Pioneer JC. It's should be name Teck whye Secondary JC. It's student Behave more like Loud rowdy 2 Secondary sch them.they want attract attention all way till 10pm.do what kind of activities Why this JC hide behind this primary Secondary Sch at wrong place .So isolated.It should move out forever for good to the students.
JPJC held its career fair, and the enthusiam of the students to take in the information and experiences was indeed commendable.
